component.name: Bluray Java menus (BDJ) plugin for VLC
component.summary: Provides Bluray Java menus (BDJ) support in VLC.
component.description: Provides support for Bluray Java menus (BDJ) in VLC. You need a recent KEYDB.cfg in ~/.var/app/org.videolan.VLC/config/aacs to support commercial Blurays.
